author: powercode
body:
Fixes #2596

This PR adds type inference support for the 'MemberName' parameterset for Foreach-Object.

Before this PR:
```
#this works
Get-Process | % {$_.MainModule} | % Com<Tab>
#this doesn't
Get-Process | % MainModule | % Com<Tab>
```
After this PR:
```
#this works (completes Company)
Get-Process | % {$_.MainModule} | % Com<Tab>
Get-Process | % MainModule | % Com<Tab> 
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @powercode Please add a PR description that we can use later for documentation. (What do you want to see in an absolutely great documentation? 😄 )

title: adding type inference for Foreach-Object -MemberName
